short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Morse Code encrypter and decrypter with customizations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
UMorse is your ultimate Morse code companion, designed to decode Morse code into text and vice versa effortlessly. Whether you're a Morse code enthusiast, a hobbyist, or simply intrigued by the art of communication through dots and dashes, UMorse provides a user-friendly platform to translate Morse code messages with ease.

Key Features:

Decode Morse Code to Text:
Unlock the secrets of Morse code messages by effortlessly translating them into readable text. UMorse employs advanced algorithms to accurately interpret Morse code signals, ensuring seamless conversion.

Encode Text to Morse Code:
Compose your own Morse code messages and watch them transform into a sequence of dots and dashes. UMorse enables you to create encrypted messages or practice Morse code transmission effortlessly.

Customizable Symbols:
Tailor UMorse to your preferences with customizable dot, dash, and separatrix symbols. Whether you prefer traditional Morse code symbols or want to experiment with unique characters, UMorse empowers you to personalize your Morse code experience.

Intuitive Interface:
Navigate UMorse with ease thanks to its intuitive and user-friendly interface. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced Morse code user, UMorse ensures a seamless experience from decoding to encoding.

Educational Tool:
Enhance your understanding of Morse code and its applications with UMorse's educational features. Explore the history of Morse code, its significance in communication, and practical uses in various fields.

Versatile Usage:
From decoding secret messages to sending encrypted communications, UMorse offers endless possibilities for Morse code enthusiasts. Whether you're honing your Morse code skills or communicating in a unique way, UMorse is your go-to app.

Unlock the world of Morse code communication with UMorse. Download now and embark on a journey of decoding, encoding, and exploring the timeless art of communication through dots and dashes.
